text:
The school sold 6 boxes of smoothie bars for $48. For each of the following questions, explain your reasoning.

  • What is the cost per box?
  • How many boxes of smoothie bars are sold id $104 is collected?
  • How much money is collected in 20 boxes are sold?

• 1 box for $8 See possible strategies below.
  • 13 boxes for $104 See possible strategies below.
  • 20 boxes for $160 See possible strategies below.
